title: [Extension Proposal] Semantic Kernel for Java

labels.name: area/quarkiverse
labels.description: This issue/PR is part of the Quarkiverse organization

body:
### Description

[Semantic Kernel](https://github.com/microsoft/semantic-kernel) is an open-source SDK that lets you easily combine AI services like OpenAI, Azure OpenAI, and Hugging Face with conventional programming languages like Java, C# and Python.

### Repository name

quarkus-semantic-kernel

### Short description

This extension eases the integration of Semantic Kernel for Java with Quarkus

### Repository Homepage URL

https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/semantic-kernel/overview/

### Repository Topics

- quarkus-extension
- AI
- Artificial Intelligence
- OpenAI
- Azure OpenAI
- Hugging Face

### Team Members

- @agoncal


### Additional context

_No response_
